channel.title: [Deathlypvpz]Add Staff to Stafftab!
channel.description:
I've been asked for this too many times, so i decided to make a little tutorial for you.
Open Requesthelp.java
Find...
[code]String[][] Staff_Config = { {"Hack3r", "28000", "28001"}, {"Hack3rdice", "28002", "28003"}, {"Ancient", "28004", "28005"} };[/code]
This was my old config, as you see the 28000,28001 were the packet lines at the top, we are going to add new text on the other packet lines...
Replace that code with this...
[code]String[][] Staff_Config = { {"OWNER", "28000", "28001"}, {"OWNER2", "28002", "28003"}, {"ADMIN", "28004", "28005"}, {"ADMIN2", "28006", "28007"}, {"MOD", "28008", "28009"}, {"MOD2", "28010", "28011"}, {"MOD3", "28012", "28013"}, {"MOD4", "28014", "28015"}, {"MOD5", "28016", "28017"} };[/code]
Obviously replacing the OWNER,OWNER2,ADMIN,ADMIN2,MOD(1-5) To your mod admin/owner's names
Have fun with this, please don't ask me how to do it again :D It was Simply Anyway.

This was my old config, as you see the 28000,28001 were the packet lines at the top, we are going to add new text on the other packet lines…

Have fun with this, please don’t ask me how to do it again
It was Simply Anyway.[/quote]Those numbers are not packet ids, they’re interface child ids…
